channel.title: 2019-10-16 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2019-10-16 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 16 Oct 2019 00:00
item.description: Morning muses with the little munchkin perched on top of her stack of books. Babbling, pointing, standing and now slowly trying to walk; this soon to be 11 brat is growing way too fast!
item.content:encoded: Morning muses with the little munchkin perched on top of her stack of books. Babbling, pointing, standing and now slowly trying to walk; this soon to be 11 brat is growing way too fast!
